meanings.definition: A light fixture that directs light downward.
meanings.sent1: The downlight in the kitchen brightens the room.
meanings.sent2: I installed a new downlight in the living room for better lighting.
meanings.sent3: The downlight in the hallway told jokes to the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: The downlight in the theater stage was a spotlight on the lead actor.
meanings.sent5: The downlight in the closet made finding clothes easy.

meanings.definition: To illuminate an area from above with a downward light source.
meanings.sent1: The stage crew will downlight the performance for dramatic effect.
meanings.sent2: We need to downlight the garden to highlight the beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The magician downlighted the audience, making them glow in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The moon downlights the earth with its gentle glow.
meanings.sent5: The streetlight downlights the path for safe walking at night.
